mapper.select: SELECT o.mark_id AS orderId, o.order_no AS orderNo, o.order_time AS orderTime, o.pay_amount AS payAmount, o.quantity AS count, o.order_status AS orderStatus, o.type FROM ((SELECT o.mark_id, o.order_no, o.order_time, o.pay_amount, 1 AS type, (SELECT SUM(oi.quantity) FROM t_order_item oi WHERE oi.order_id=o.mark_id) AS quantity, (SELECT a.`name` FROM db_base.t_attribute_info a WHERE a.`code`=o.order_status) AS order_status FROM t_order_info o WHERE o.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) UNION ALL (SELECT o.mark_id, o.order_no, o.order_time, o.pay_amount, o.quantity,3 AS type, (SELECT a.`name` FROM db_base.t_attribute_info a WHERE a.`code`=o.order_status) AS order_status FROM t_seckill_order o WHERE o.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) UNION ALL (SELECT o.mark_id, o.order_no, o.order_time, o.pay_amount, o.quantity,2 AS type, (CASE WHEN g.server_status=1 THEN '拼团中' ELSE (SELECT a.`name` FROM db_base.t_attribute_info a WHERE a.`code`=o.order_status) END) AS order_status FROM t_teambuy_group g LEFT JOIN t_teambuy_order o ON g.mark_id=o.group_id WHERE o.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND g.server_status=2)) o

SELECT o.mark_id AS orderId, o.order_no AS orderNo, o.order_time AS orderTime, o.pay_amount AS payAmount, o.quantity AS count, '待发货' AS orderStatus, o.type FROM ((SELECT o.mark_id, o.order_no, o.order_status, o.order_time, o.pay_amount, (SELECT SUM(oi.quantity) FROM t_order_item oi WHERE oi.order_id=o.mark_id) AS quantity,1 AS type FROM t_order_info o WHERE o.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (o.order_status='OT03' OR o.order_status='OT02')) UNION ALL (SELECT o.mark_id, o.order_no, o.order_status, o.order_time, o.pay_amount, o.quantity,3 AS type FROM t_seckill_order o WHERE o.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (o.order_status='OT03' OR o.order_status='OT02')) UNION ALL (SELECT o.mark_id, o.order_no, o.order_status, o.order_time, o.pay_amount, o.quantity,2 AS type FROM t_teambuy_group g LEFT JOIN t_teambuy_order o ON g.mark_id=o.group_id WHERE o.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND g.server_status=2 AND (o.order_status='OT03' OR o.order_status='OT02'))) o
